## Bio üßòüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

**Sita Lujintanon is an epidemiologic-implementation researcher.** Her research overall aims to **promote equity in HIV care engagement** in Thailand and globally through the use of differentiated service delivery approach and implementation strategies to facilitate intervention delivery. She is interested in using epidemiologic methods to answer impactful questions with imperfect data and overcoming **missing data problems**, particularly related to missing outcomes due to loss to follow-up and competing risk She also has a growing interest in applying **observational-implementation research** approach for rapid knowledge generation.
